node.title: A Truffle Imbued With Winter Whimsy
node.description: New assortments from the Austin candymaker Delysia Chocolatier pay tribute to the “Nutcracker” and the flavors of the season.
node.content: ["Holiday chocolates are given an interesting twist in some new assortments by Delysia Chocolatier in Austin, Texas. One is defined by the theme of the \u201cNutcracker,\u201d with decorative images from the ballet and chocolate truffle flavors like rosemary-orange, Lebkuchen and plum pudding. \u201cWinter Wonderland,\u201d with snowy scenes on each piece, includes truffles seasoned with hot toddy flavors, peppermint mocha and Swiss fondue. Delivery by Christmas is guaranteed for orders placed by Dec. 17.", "Follow NYT Food on Twitter and NYT Cooking on Instagram, Facebook and Pinterest. Get regular updates from NYT Cooking, with recipe suggestions, cooking tips and shopping advice."]
